strings.Value: "...bite me, you greedy bastards! I don't care. I never wanted your crappy helmet!"
"There's no point in being bitter, Amiri. {name} will decide who will wear the Stag Lord's helm. {mf|He|She} is our leader. It's up to {mf|him|her}".
"Aha, ha, ha! Don't sulk, Amiri! I'm sure {name} will hear your wishes about the Stag Lord's helm."
"Amiri, why the devil should we argue over who will get the Stag Lord's helmet?! We haven't even defeated him yet!"
